events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer role and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation by our technical team.
A recruiter from our engineering division has been assigned to guide you through the next steps in the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was completed with positive feedback regarding your experience and skills relevant to the developer position.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC to assess your engineering and development skills.
You have successfully completed your technical interview with strong performance in coding and system design problems.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 23rd at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and we appreciated your insights into teamwork and communication.
We have extended a formal job offer for the software engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as part of our software engineering team.
The onboarding process has begun with orientation sessions and setup of development tools to ensure a smooth start.
The hiring process is now complete, and you are officially part of the engineering team. We look forward to great achievements together.
